div.ab: The 9th year, Mecheir 18, � in duplicate. The 9th year from Horos, komogrammateus of Berenikis Thesmophorou. Statement according to parcels of the unproductive land in the survey to crops at Berenikis Thesmophorou. Land sanded up in the 9th year because of its adjacence to the desert ... Land used up for new canals in the 15th year for the irrigation of the land on the shore, 3 arouras at 14 1/2 1/3 artabas. Also that in the 23rd year cultivated by the former agents of Aristonikos, 3 at 19 1/2 1/3. Also that in the 24th year, 3 1/2 1/3 1/12 at 22 1/2 1/3. Total 9 1/2 1/3 1/12 arouras at 56 1/2 1/3 1/12. Land waterlogged in the 6th year 9 1/2 1/8 1/16 at 47 1/2 1/12 artabas. Deducting what was cultivated in the 9th year for the sowing, 3 arouras at 3 artabas, [there remain �]
